__e: Because there are still political prisoners in our jails!
Right. And you're a political prisoner.
Your imprisonment and your escape with two other women, political prisoners.
Because he knew that the truth wouldn't matter, that I would be convicted in the court of public opinion just for being there, and that my political career would be over before it ever started.
That may be so, but it wouldn't look good for your political career, would it?
The person who wrote that letter we received knows many things about your political career, and he knows a lot about me.
Because the political situation stinks down here.
General if things get too hairy for us politically, we have to bug out and bring you with us.
Yes, the political situation is not very pleasant at the moment.
This is a political situation, harry.
Billy, tell him he can't make a report in this political situation.
